line_1: "Was it for this, my watchful eyes grow dim?

line_1: Man made for kings! those optics are but dim
line_2: That tell you so — say rather, they for him.

line_1: Tho' his sense weakens, tho' his eye grows dim,
line_2: That rest which comes to all, comes not to him.

line_2: Earth made for man, and man himself for him.
